Community Security and Arms Control (CSAC) Programme to support public Information and Community Sensitization on SALW control and community security, guided by national legislation and policiesin the Republic of South Sudan
Community Security and Arms Control (CSAC) Programme support to SSPRC State offices to develop and implement State Conflict Transformation Strategies (CTS) in 6 states in the Republic of South Sudan
Community Security & Small Arms Control (CSAC) support to improved security environment allows for development at the community level with specific attention to women’s security needs in South Sudan.
